title: Convince me to play your champion
body:
I am looking to play a new champion. I most often played Diana, Jhin, and several others. I have no huge role preference so give it your best shot. Tell me why you think your champion is the the most fun and or best to pick up and learn. Your pros and cons and why you love the champion so much. Also just for additional fun, favorite skin on that champion? Let the games begin! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body:
Why I play Jax

- Relatively easy to pick up but leaves allot of room for mastery of his playstyle and skills that separates casual Jax players from the monsters you've had to watch 2v1 your top and jungle 15 minutes in. 

- Winning your lane and securing kills for yourself in 1v1 matchups pretty much allows you to push down your enemy tier 2 turret with ease, killing the enemy laner under tower easily due to your stun, dodge and ultimate. 

- Keep the enemy jungle warded and play with calculated aggression and you are extremely frustrating to deal with once fed.

- Forces you to learn how to win your lane even in hard matchups due to the fact if your shutdown early it can be very hard to mount a comeback and without gold you may feel useless. 

- Build a gunblade early and enjoy high burst, an all in potential thats god tier, and the ability to heal yourself back to full health off of a minion wave.

- Take exhaust against Irelia and Riven to have them do -1 damage to you in an all in.


Pro's

- Huge snowball potential

- One of the best ultimates in the game that is practically thousand's of gold's worth of MR and Armor that last's for 8 seconds. It also give's you free damage

- Has the "Hyper Carry" playstyle that allows you to carry games off your own back

- Does huge damage and is tanky

- TF can't gold card you when your stun is up

- People who cant play Renekton pick Renekton to counter you

- Has a gap closer stun that is great for successful jungle ganks

- Can top or jungle and mid if your adventurous (AP burst)

Con's

- Gold hungry champ that can fall behind if he doesn't farm well / snowball / gets killed alot early

- Pretty lackluster teamfighter until you have like 3 items unless your ahead and can insta kill squishies

- A good Pantheon and Renekton can be hell in lane

- Irelia does what you do and is a bit stronger in the current meta

- If you don't understand how split pushing works properly you'll find yourself dying alot to 1v3's for nothing

- Teammates love to blame you for not grouping when they push without wards and die 4v5


Notes

- Watch high level Jax players who play super aggressive in lane to pick up some pointers. (Hashinshin and Diyos are 2 i've watched recently)
Good comment I have played jax before but mostly back when guinsoos did the aoe damage at 8 stacks adn the devourer item was the thing to go. Been awhile since then. Best jax skin?

its especially fun when you have 45% cdr and people chase you all over the map to try and kill you .

urgot top

pros

* barely played so not many people can deal with a good one,
* good combo with e+q,q,q and with your w on your aa's and q's gain a slow.
* insanely good against both melee and ranged top meta picks 
* with the right build insane damage potential,( late game with triforce and 1 second q's your looking at damage within in the 1000's in a matter of seconds)
* very good at 1v1's, your attacks and q's reduce damage, your e gives armour reduc and your ult gives you damage reduction.
* very good at lane bullying, i would say one of the best, ive literally had people farming under tower and still taking fair amounts of damage
* ult gets you easy kills early game if used correctly

cons

* bad rap in the community, literally tilts people in champ select
* mana is a must first item, if you dont take a crystal then build it into a tear your gonna have a bad time
* cant engage much pre lvl 3, this is a prefrence of mine as ive seen plenty of urgots dig a hole that just gets bigger.
* no mobility so if your get caught out your dead.
* if you dont have battle cast, his model is just clunky and outdated feeling imo
